```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(highcharter)
library(reactable)

path <- '../.' #Used so I can run code from the markdown
source(paste0(path,'./references/functions/load.R'))
```


```{r}

player_data <- read_csv(paste0(path,'./references/data/clean/2020_Player_Data.csv'))

summary <- player_data %>%
  filter(picked == 'TRUE') %>%
  group_by(round, teamname) %>%
  summarise(
    points = sum(points, na.rm=T)
  )
    

hchart(summary, "boxplot", hcaes(x='teamname', ))

```
